originalText.text: My mother had an appointment with Dr Fufa and she was dismissive and aloof to her  situation. She came to her for a second an opinion , and Did not offer any information whatsoever about her MRI and sat back and provided no guidance. It was like pulling teeth to get any information out of her.

text.text: My mother had an appointment with Dr Fufa and she was dismissive and aloof to her  situation. She came to her for a second an opinion , and Did not offer any information whatsoever about her MRI and sat back and provided no guidance. It was like pulling teeth to get any information out of her.

originalText.text: Horrible bedside manner. She spends 30 seconds with you and when you ask questions, she gets mad. Made me feel bad for wanting to ask any questions about my injury. I've had a lot of injuries and seen a lot of doctors over the years and she was, by far the rudest doctor I have ever seen. Doesn't want to explain anything and does not care if you're in pain. If surgery doesn't apply to you, she treats you like trash because she knows she won't make any money off of you. I love HSS but she makes me think twice before seeing anyone else there.

originalText.text: I see negative reviews here but cannot imagine how that could be.  Dr. Fufa is a top-notch surgeon as well as a wonderful kind caring person.  She and her staff were beyond helpful (more than I can say for most doctors in the area) and got my surgery scheduled and done with as much clarity and speed as possible, and the procedure went so well.  I have full use of my hand now, and it’s thanks to Dr. Fufa.

text.text: I see negative reviews here but cannot imagine how that could be.  Dr. Fufa is a top-notch surgeon as well as a wonderful kind caring person.  She and her staff were beyond helpful (more than I can say for most doctors in the area) and got my surgery scheduled and done with as much clarity and speed as possible, and the procedure went so well.  I have full use of my hand now, and it’s thanks to Dr. Fufa.

originalText.text: She was the best.  Answered every single question I had and was patient and timely. She's a true gem.

text.text: She was the best.  Answered every single question I had and was patient and timely. She's a true gem.

originalText.text: Dr Fufa was not only kind and patient (as English is not my mother’s first language so the translation took time), she is a rockstar of a surgeon! My mother, then 86 with osteoporosis, shattered her elbow and needed surgery immediately. Dr Fufa performed a 6-hour surgery and within a few short months, my Mom recovered the full range of motion of her elbow/arm. The nurses and staff at the hospital were also both personable and professional. I can’t praise Dr Fufa enough for her amazing skills, judgement, and overall expertise!
